channel.title: About Owncast
channel.description:
[Owncast](https://owncast.online) is a self-hosted live video and web chat server for use with existing popular broadcasting software.
Owncast is for people who are live streamers, or who wants to host live streams for others. It’s a *“one to many”* broadcast.
source code: <https://github.com/owncast/owncast> documentation: <https://owncast.online/docs/>

item.title: About Owncast

item.description:
Owncast is a self-hosted live video and web chat server for use with existing popular broadcasting software.

Owncast is for people who are live streamers, or who wants to host live streams for others. It’s a “one to many” broadcast.

source code: https://github.com/owncast/owncast
documentation: https://owncast.online/docs/
